audiobook.description:
Author(s): Rupi Kaur Narrator(s): Rupi Kaur Rupi Kaur performs the first-ever recording of home body, her third #1 New York Times bestselling collection of poetry and prose. This production was performed and recorded in 2021 along with the brand-new audio edition of milk and honey and the first audio recording of her second collection, the sun and her flowers.

Kaur constantly embraces growth, and in home body, she walks listeners through a reflective and intimate journey visiting the past, the present, and the potential of the self. home body is a collection of raw, honest conversations with oneself—reminding listeners to fill up on love, acceptance, community, family, and embrace change. Themes of nature and nurture, light and dark, rest here.

i dive into the well of my body
and end up in another world
everything i need
already exists in me
there’s no need
to look anywhere else

—home

Author(s): Rupi Kaur
Narrator(s): Rupi Kaur
<b>Rupi Kaur performs the first-ever recording of <i>home body,</i> her third #1 <i>New York Times</i> bestselling collection of poetry and prose. This production was performed and recorded in 2021 along with the brand-new audio edition of <i>milk and honey </i>and the first audio recording of her second collection, <i>the sun and her flowers.</i></b><br><br>Kaur constantly embraces growth, and in <i>home body</i>, she walks listeners through a reflective and intimate journey visiting the past, the present, and the potential of the self. <i>home body</i> is a collection of raw, honest conversations with oneself—reminding listeners to fill up on love, acceptance, community, family, and embrace change. Themes of nature and nurture, light and dark, rest here.<br> <br>i dive into the well of my body<br> and end up in another world<br> everything i need<br> already exists in me<br> there’s no need<br> to look anywhere else<br> <br>—home
audiobook.name: Home Body
